item.description:
Eric, the newest (but experienced) mechanic at Gorham Bike & Ski, will teach us how to do basic maintenance on our bikes, including changing a tube, maintaining the chain, and adjusting brakes. We will present the "ABC Quick Check", and discuss what are the must-have tools for your on-bike toolkit. Bring your own bike and tools if you wish, there will be some limited space to work on a few bikes.

(Note that we will start 1/2 hr earlier than usual, to allow more time without going so late, but it's informal so don't worry if you can't make it until 7.)
item.name: DIY Bike Maintenance
